prod_short_desc: Get in training with Disney Mulan, ready for the challenge ahead!
prod_long_desc:
LEGO® l Disney Mulan’s Training Day is easy to build and perfect for recreating favorite moments from the movie. Train hard using the turning training dummy, and sword and catapult with boulders, before taking a break with her foal, Khan. This LEGO® l Disney toy for girls and boys includes lots of beautiful and authentic details, including Mulan's yellow dress, her fan and a tea ceremony. Get creative using the modular design to easily move and swap sections within the model, or integrate the family temple with other compatible LEGO l Disney sets to build your own dream creations. Includes a mini-doll figure plus a horse figure.
Includes a Mulan mini-doll figure, plus Khan the horse figure.
Features a family temple, turning training dummy, catapult, tea ceremony and a cherry blossom tree.
Accessory elements include a sword, boulders, fan, teapot and a teacup.
Customize the set by easily swapping and rearranging internal features such as the tea ceremony, catapult and cherry blossom tree.
Combine, swap and mix this model with other compatible LEGO® l Disney toys to build your own dream creations.
Take aim at the training dummy with the catapult, and use the turn function to make it spin as Mulan practices her sword skills.
Help Mulan perform a tea ceremony and cool her down with the cute fan.
This toy for girls and boys is suitable for ages 5-12.
Family Temple measures over 4” high, 2” wide and 2” long.
